*** Bug 167334 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

This error was due to working with an unpatched Axis 1.3 plugin. The following critical implementation note contains the instructions to fix this issue:

======================================================================================================
CRITICAL PROJECT NOTES:
======================================================================================================
1. At this time, the XDS Soap Client is dependant on the Axis 1.3 API. This API does not provide an implementation
of the javax.acitvation.DataHandler nor the javax.mail.internet.MimeMultipart packages needed for compilation and
SOAP with attachments. Java Mail 1.3.3 (mailapi.jar) and Java Activation Framework 1.0.2 (activation.jar) must 
be downloaded separately and incoroprated into the build path or dependencies of this plugin. 
Take note of exact versions of these .jars. These .jars can be found at
JAF v1.0.2:
http://java.sun.com/products/archive/javabeans/jaf102.html

JAVA MAIL v1.3.3:
http://java.sun.com/products/javamail/javamail-1_3_3.html

2. We are experiencing problems with the Axis 1.3 support for SOAP Attachments (for explicit details
see the following posting: 
http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/ws-axis-user/200607.mbox/%3cb50b8b100607191155s4c7159e7i20f5c3b8bf4434c8@mail.gmail.com%3e
). We have yet to hear a response to this posting, and for the time being the following steps are needed to
enable attachment support (needed when using the XDS Document Source).
 	1. Download Axis 1.3 source code from: http://www.apache.org/dyn/closer.cgi/ws/axis/1_3
 	2. Unzip the content into a directory of your choosing.
 	3. In org/apache/axis/attachments/AttachmentsImpl.java comment out line 229 and lines 586 through 595
 	   (Specifically, the operation being removed is "multipart = null;")
 	4. Re-compile this class and overwrite the existing class file in the axis.jar included in the
 	   org.apache.axis plugin for OHF.

=====================================================
